DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS FOCUS : IRVINE ; NEWPORT MAN DIES AFTER CYCLE CRASH
DOC.TEXT: A 25-year-old Newport Beach resident was fatally injured Thursday when his motorcycle crashed into a stalled car on MacArthur Boulevard at Newport Coast Drive , police said . The victim ' s name was not immediately released . Police Sgt . Scott Cade said the stalled car was in a traffic_lane . Before officers arrived , three minor , rear-end collisions occurred as cars tried to avoid the vehicle . As the drivers were exchanging information on the shoulder of MacArthur at 1:15 p.m. , the motorcycle struck the rear of the stalled car , which was still in the traffic_lane , Cade said . The motorcyclist died at Western Medical Center-Santa Ana . Police said he had been wearing a helmet , but it apparently had not been strapped . It was found some distance from him . MARK I . PINSKY
